DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the effect of eye opening/closure on the quality of IOP (intraocular pressure) related patterns recorded with SENSIMED Triggerfish. Each subject receives 2 24-hour recording sessions, one with the recorded eye open and the other with the eye closed,using an ophthalmic patch.
